And now a question regarding https://github.com/johnpapa/angular-styleguide#style-y125

== function customersService() { } ==

Why not writing UpperCamelCase (like a controller). As far as I understood, the service also gets instantiated with ‘new’ (by AngularJS). Means: this is a constructor function (where you also can use the ‘this’ keyword), right?

Or maybe I’m just confusing things…
